Sector.description: Platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] sector [Gleisabschnitt, Steigabschnitt] information.

name.description: Name of the sector [Sektor / Mast etc.].

start.description: Start of the sector given in meters in local coordinates.

end.description: End of the sector given in meters in local coordinates.

cubePosition.description: Position of the cube [Sektorwuerfel] given in meters in local coordinates.

cubeSignage.description: Indicates whether cube [Sektorwuerfel] has signage [Beschilderung] nor not.

AccessibilityStatus.description:
Status of platform accessibility [Barrierefreiheit] information.
- AVAILABLE (accessibility item is available)
- NOT_AVAILABLE (accessibility item is not available)
- PARTIAL (accessibility item is only partial available, for instance availble for 12a but not for 12b and therefore not for 12 in total)
- NOT_APPLICABLE (accessibility item is not applicable because it depends on availability of other items, for instance stair mark depends on step free access)
- UNKNOWN (no information on availability for accessibility item)

Accessibility.description: Accessibility [Barrierefreiheit] information for a particular platform.

ReferencePointType.description:
Type of a reference point.
- STOP_SIGNAL (Haltesignal)
- STOP_BOARD (Haltetafel)

ReferencePoint.description: Reference point that indicates where a vehicle [Fahrzeug] stops at a platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform].

referencePointType.description:
Type of a reference point.
- STOP_SIGNAL (Haltesignal)
- STOP_BOARD (Haltetafel)

position.description: Position of the reference point in meter in local coordinates.

maxLength.description: Length up to the reference point is to be used by a stopping formation.

readableFromOrigin.description: Determines the direction the reference point is to be used. If true, the formation moves from origin to positive values in local coordinates.

orientation.description: Orientation of the platform in degrees (north=0, east=90, ...), seen from the origin of the local coordinates.

referencePoints.description: Positions of the reference points that determine the position of a stopping train at the platform.

optics.description: Names of the operational units [Optiken] that belong to the platform.

networkPlatforms.description: Names of the network platforms [Netzgleis] that belong to the platform.

Platform.description: Platform [Gleis, Bahnsteig, Plattform] information. All ranges and positions of objects are given in meter in local coordinates, e.g. as a distance to a fixed point somewhere on the platform and differentiating between the two possible directions by a plus- and a minus-sign.

name.description: Name of the platform (12, 1a, Nord, SÃ¼d etc.).

start.description: Start of the usable part of the platform given in meter in local coordinates. This value may differ from zero and may be positive as well as negative.

end.description: End of the usable part of the platform given in meter in local coordinates.

linkedPlatforms.description: List of platforms [Gleise] that share the same physical platform [Bahnsteig].

parentPlatform.description: Name of parent platform in case this is a subplatform [Teilgleis].

headPlatform.description: Indicates whether platform is a head platform [Kopfgleis].

sectors.description: List of sectors [Sektoren] that belong to the platform.

accessibility.description: Accessibility [Barrierefreiheit] information for a particular platform.

Pick_GroupedStopPlace.name-or-evaNumber_.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

productClass.description: Most likely D | N | S | F

hiddenReihung.description: Most likely does not have coach sequence

Pick_SubscrChannel.channelId_.description: From T, pick a set of properties whose keys are in the union K

selectedWeekdays.description:
1 or 0 for each day, starts at monday
example: 1001001
Monday, Thursday, Sunday selected

isFromPrice.description: Does a more expensive Tarif exist?

isBookable.description: Can you you still buy this?

ushrp.description: Is a station nearby enough for routing?

klasse.description: 0: Unknown; 1: erste; 2: zweite; 3: 1&2; 4: Not for passengers

isActuallyIC.description: Train is reported as ICE but has IC coach sequence

differentDestination.description: do groups have a different destination

differentZugnummer.description: Do we have several trains in one? (FlÃ¼gelung)

TransportType.description:
Type of transport.
- HIGH_SPEED_TRAIN (High speed train [Hochgeschwindigkeitszug] like ICE or TGV etc.)
- INTERCITY_TRAIN (Inter city train [Intercityzug])
- INTER_REGIONAL_TRAIN (Inter regional train [Interregiozug])
- REGIONAL_TRAIN (Regional train [Regionalzug])
- CITY_TRAIN (City train [S-Bahn])
- SUBWAY (Subway [U-Bahn])
- TRAM (Tram [Strassenbahn])
- BUS (Bus [Bus])
- FERRY (Ferry [Faehre])
- FLIGHT (Flight [Flugzeug])
- CAR (Car [Auto])
- TAXI (Taxi)
- SHUTTLE (Shuttle [Ruftaxi])
- BIKE ((E-)Bike [Fahrrad])
- SCOOTER ((E-)Scooter [Roller])
- WALK (Walk ([Laufen])
- UNKNOWN (Unknown)

parameters.description: EvaNumber of a stop of your train
parameters.name: station

parameters.description: Only returns stopPlaces iris-tts can handle (/abfahrten)
parameters.name: filterForIris

parameters.description: Only returns stopPlaces iris-tts can handle (/abfahrten)
parameters.name: filterForIris
